page.title: 09Population of Malhamdale
page.content:
Although the block as a whole has a population of about 260,over 1/2 of these are found in{Airton}alone.The rest of the area is very sparsely populated.The majority of the children live in{Airton}and{Calton}. The population of this area is predominantly white,middle-class,and Protestant.
{Employment in Malhamdale} Although many people leave the block to work because there are no factories or such like to keep people in the area,no-one is involuntarily unemployed.In the block itself,farming is very important.
